credit_line: Bequest of Charles M. Davenport, Class of 1901
title: Windsor Style Love Seat
description: Maple and hickory with pine seat.  Fan-back type with eleven long spindles passing through the low back to support a graceful crest rail.  Curved seat 34" long.  The continuous low-back terminates in graceful flattened arm tips supported by posts with turnings which match the legs.  Very rare in this size and design.
